sentence.Network_en: First, the proverb must be a saying, not merely a traditional word like " fiddlesticks " or " phooey '.
sentence.Network_cn: 首先, 谚语必须是一句格言, 而不仅仅是一个传统的词,如 “ flddlesticks ” (胡说),“phooey ” (呸),等等.

sentence.Network_en: Not what? Snobs! Phooey on the First Families.
sentence.Network_cn: 不是什么? 势利小人!呸! 什么一流家族.

sentence.Network_en: Phooey! Sucking your thumb without a blanket is like eating a cone without ice cream!
sentence.Network_cn: 嘘呜! 没有毯子的时候吮吸着你的拇指就像是在吃一个没有冰激凌的冰激凌壳!

list.explanation: (表示轻蔑、厌恶、不信、怀疑等的感叹语)呸!啐!

example.en: This is the worst food I ever ate. Phooey!
example.zh: 这是我吃到过的最差劲的东西。啐!
呸!我才不信什么爱情呐!
